  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "RECEPTIONIST/FRONT DESK OFFICER",
  "description": "Royal Hospital, a National Health Insurance Scheme accredited health care provider and one of the first ever private hospitals located in Enugu requires for immediate employment the following:

Job Location: RECEPTIONIST/FRONT DESK OFFICER 

Job Location: ENUGU

Candidate must possess the following:


	Minimum of OND/HND in any discipline.
	&nbsp;Must be computer literate
	&nbsp;Must be proficient in typing
	&nbsp;Must have good communication and interpersonal skills
	&nbsp;Previous experience in a Secretarial position is an added advantage.
	Must be resident in Enugu.


Responsibilities and Attributes


	Assisting with administrative tasks
	&nbsp;Receives the guest and answers questions in person by telephone
	&nbsp;Provide client support services in accurate and timely fashion.
	&nbsp;Maintain high level of professionalism and competence in every client interaction.
	&nbsp;Build positive and productive relationships with clients.
	Make frequent client calls and visits to strengthen client relationships.
	&nbsp;Analyze and resolve service issues promptly.
	&nbsp;Inform management about complex client issues and resolutions.
	&nbsp;Maintain client focused working environment for team.
	&nbsp;Work in compliance with company policies and procedures.
	&nbsp;Identify and develop new business opportunities with client contacts.
	&nbsp;Responds to inquiries and refers when necessary to the appropriate official or department.
	Prepares outgoing mail, sorts and distributes incoming mails.
	&nbsp;Utilize effective problem solving and time management skills in client service operations.
	&nbsp;Assist in risk assessment and mitigation activities.
	Develop process improvements to enhance service efficiency and effectiveness.


REMUNERATION FOR ALL POSITIONS: Very attractive, highly competitive and negotiable.

METHOD OF APPLICATION

Interested candidates should send their applications with a detailed resume and three verifiable references, attaching all credentials and Birth Certificates or Statutory Declaration of Age to: info@royalhospital.com

NOTE: Applicants must reside in Enugu. Short listed candidates will be invited for interview. All applications must be received on or before Monday, 11th August, 2025.",

RECEPTIONIST/FRONT DESK OFFICER Job at Royal Hospital




        
    

        
        Royal Hospital, a National Health Insurance Scheme accredited health care provider and one of the first ever private hospitals located in Enugu requires for immediate employment the following:

Job Location: RECEPTIONIST/FRONT DESK OFFICER 

Job Location: ENUGU

Candidate must possess the following:


	Minimum of OND/HND in any discipline.
	 Must be computer literate
	 Must be proficient in typing
	 Must have good communication and interpersonal skills
	 Previous experience in a Secretarial position is an added advantage.
	Must be resident in Enugu.


Responsibilities and Attributes
     

            
    




	Assisting with administrative tasks
	 Receives the guest and answers questions in person by telephone
	 Provide client support services in accurate and timely fashion.
	 Maintain high level of professionalism and competence in every client interaction.
	 Build positive and productive relationships with clients.
	Make frequent client calls and visits to strengthen client relationships.
	 Analyze and resolve service issues promptly.
	 Inform management about complex client issues and resolutions.
	 Maintain client focused working environment for team.
	 Work in compliance with company policies and procedures.
	 Identify and develop new business opportunities with client contacts.
	 Responds to inquiries and refers when necessary to the appropriate official or department.
	Prepares outgoing mail, sorts and distributes incoming mails.
	 Utilize effective problem solving and time management skills in client service operations.
	 Assist in risk assessment and mitigation activities.
	Develop process improvements to enhance service efficiency and effectiveness.


REMUNERATION FOR ALL POSITIONS: Very attractive, highly competitive and negotiable.

METHOD OF APPLICATION

Interested candidates should send their applications with a detailed resume and three verifiable references, attaching all credentials and Birth Certificates or Statutory Declaration of Age to: info@royalhospital.com

NOTE: Applicants must reside in Enugu. Short listed candidates will be invited for interview. All applications must be received on or before Monday, 11th August, 2025.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Job Position: Registered Nurse, Registered Midwife, CHEW and Healthcare Assistant

Candidate must possess the following:


	&nbsp;Possess a Certificate from any recognized college of nursing, including practicing license or evidence of completion of study
	&nbsp;Must be computer literate
	Must be proficient in typing

	&nbsp;Must have basic skills in patient management, drug administration and patient counseling

Registered Nurse, Registered Midwife, CHEW and Healthcare Assistant Job at Royal Hospital Limited




        
    

        
        Royal Hospital Ltd, a National Health Insurance Scheme accredited health care provider was established in 1973, it is one of the first ever private hospitals in Enugu state and has a rich history of care to many residents of the Eastern Nigeria and beyond.

It is situated in the prestigious G.R.A at the heart of Enugu on a hill overlooking the state secretariat, close to the Banking and business zones of Enugu city. Royal Hospital requires for immediate employment the following:

Job Position: Registered Nurse, Registered Midwife, CHEW and Healthcare Assistant

Job Location: ENUGU

Candidate must possess the following:
     

            
    




	 Possess a Certificate from any recognized college of nursing, including practicing license or evidence of completion of study
	 Must be computer literate
	Must be proficient in typing
	Must have good communication and interpersonal skills
	 Must have basic skills in patient management, drug administration and patient counseling
	Must have good Knowledge of nursing process and plan, as well as medical terminology
	 Must be resident in Enugu or have accommodation available


Responsibilities and Attributes


	 Assisting with administrative tasks
	 Must be able to process prescriptions.
	Managing patients, answering phone calls, and doing clerical work in the Ward.
	Serving medication timely and appropriately
	Upholding good nursing processes and plan
	 Working  hand in hand with the Doctors in providing top notch patient management and support


REMUNERATION FOR ALL POSITIONS: Highly competitive and negotiable.

METHOD OF APPLICATION

Interested candidates should send their applications with a detailed resume and three verifiable references, attaching all credentials and Birth Certificates or Statutory Declaration of Age to: info@royalhospital.com

NOTE: The hospital does not offer accommodation. Short listed candidates will be invited for interview, only candidates residing in Enugu will be considered. All applications must be received on or before Monday, 11th August, 2025.    

    

        Click here to Apply
